page.title: 10LEISURE TIME
page.content: We interviewed 11 people to find out how they spent their leisure time. We foundthat gardening is the most popular hobby for people whe lived in our area. None of them go to sports centres .In the tweleve KM. squares and the most popular sport was horse riding and a lot of people went swimming in their spare time.Reading was quite popular too.Some of the children play tennis go bike riding and play hockey. Football and rugby were very popular in the hobby section. Only one person went to a sports centre some people just watch the sport they like on television. Television is the most popular leisure activity for children.Many people own cats and dogs ,and walking the dog accounted for a lot of leisure time.
